ROLL.setValue:
make :roll + 1 floor rand 6
make :piece item 0 fromplayer curplayer "piece 
 repeat :roll [
    make :dz objdz :piece
    make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Next ]
  movepiece :piece :next ] 
  make :dz objdz :piece
 if hasclass :dz "special [ make :next dzfollow :dz [ "Jump ]
  movepiece :piece :next 
 ]
